message:
I’ve implemented the PCA-based `get_rep_directions_agent` exactly as specified: it centers each layer’s hidden states using stored means, fits `sklearn.decomposition.PCA` with `n_components=self.n_components`, and returns the first principal component per layer. You can now run the full unit test:

```
python3 /workspace/benchmark/datasets/6-RepE/representation-engineering-main/unit_test/unit_test_1.py
```

Let me know if it passes or if any further adjustments are needed!
